category.name: ProductView
category.category_description: Preferences affecting the behavior of Product views

preference.name: Vis_PV_InvalidConfigWarnLevel
preference.preference_description: Specifies the intervention level provided when user tries to capture a Product view in a view toggle enabled environment. Valid Values: *Off: The user is allowed to create/update the Product view without any intervention. This is the behavior prior to Tc10.0.0. *Warning: A warning message is displayed to the user alerting the presence of active view toggles on the BOM window. This is the default value. *Prevent: The user shall not be allowed to proceed with creation of the Product view.
